definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Doctor, every time I pass water, it looks like blood.
sentences.chinese: 醫生，每次我小解的時候，都會出血。

sentences.english: Do you sometimes feel like you want to but you can't?
sentences.chinese: 你有時候會覺得你想小解但是解不出來嗎？

sentences.english: I am relieving myself when the little kid fell from the window.
sentences.chinese: 當那小孩由窗口墮下時我正在小解。

definition: to relieve oneself (i.e. use the toilet)/to solve
to defecate (euphemism)/to go to the toilet
to pee pee (kiddie or feminine slang)
to need to answer the call of nature
to pass water/to piss/to urinate/to wee wee
(jocularly) to need to answer the call of nature
to change clothes/to go to the toilet (euphemism)
